group_1.progressFnarration: (In this loop, she still@doesn't have enough@combat experience.)
(In the last loop,@Miss Akemi came to save her...@but this time, she hasn't.)
(Did she really decide@to abandon this loop?)
(She changed herself to make@her wish come true.)
(I'm a Magical Girl too,@just like her.)
(Even if the world were to@get in my way...)
(If I really want it to happen...)

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]How am I able to fight?!@What's with these scissors?!
[fontSize:20]I have no idea what's going on,@but somehow I'm fighting!
[fontSize:20]This is all new to me, so I'm probably@more surprised than you are!

group_1.progressFnarration: (I don't think I could ever pull off@the kind of teamwork that@Miss Akemi displayed...)

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]Everything is t-t-t-totally@under control. L-leave it to me!
[fontSize:20]Surely some mysterious power@will awaken in me, and...
[fontSize:20]I knew you'd come@to rescue Miss Kaname...

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]I can't return Madoka Kaname@back to her old self.
[fontSize:20]That's why I need to rewind@time and do this over again.
[fontSize:20]If there's no way to defeat Walpurgisnacht,@then there's no point in rewinding time.
[fontSize:20]That's why I try to gather as much information@as possible, even in failed loops like this one.
[fontSize:20]This is just a part of@my intel gathering.

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]Even if it's a failure, abandoning@Miss Kaname in this loop seems kind of...!

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]You don't think I know that already?!
[fontSize:20]Of course I don't want to do this.
[fontSize:20]If I could, I'd rather be@on good terms with her.
[fontSize:20]In the end, I have to rewind time!
[fontSize:20]That's why I can't get close to her!
[fontSize:20]I can't afford to create any more@pointless memories with her!
[fontSize:20]That's why I won't get@involved with this Madoka.

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]I know it hurts to say goodbye!@It's painful!
[fontSize:20]But those feelings are@still important to you...!
[fontSize:20]You shouldn't keep lying to yourself like it@doesn't matter, and that it doesn't affect you!
[fontSize:20]Don't numb yourself to the pain@of saying goodbye to Miss Kaname.
[fontSize:20]I'll stick by your side...@A-and I'll do whatever it takes!

group_1.Fnarration: (I try desperately to call out to Miss Akemi...)
(But she doesn't listen to anything I say.)

group_1.progressFnarration: (Her leg is caught by an@appendage of the Witch...)
(Ah, right! She can't stop time@while it's touching her...)
(...and she's about to be@devoured by the Witch...)

group_1.Fnarration: (It hurts. It hurts. It hurts. IT HURTS.@ithurtsithurtsithurtsithurts!!!)
(Arms broken, legs sundered.@My skull caves inwards.)
(Body crushed, ribs stab into my organs.@My heart stops...)

group_1.progressFnarration: (Every moment is playing out@exactly like that vision.)
(Miss Akemi doesn't respond.@This is just like in the vision.)
(But, how? What do I need to do@to change it?)
(If time keeps ticking as is, will I@die protecting Miss Akemi?)
(She tosses a bomb into@the Witch's stomach...)
(An appendage snakes out from@the inside, and grabs Miss Akemi.)
(She attempts to stop time,@but it doesn't work.)
(It's so sudden, so Miss Kaname@can't react.)
(I'm the only one who can save her.)

group_1.textAvCenter: [fontSize:20]There's no other path left for me!!!

group_1.Fnarration: (There's no way to unsee what's already been seen.)
(It hurts. It hurts. It hurts. IT HURTS.@ithurtsithurtsithurtsithurts!!!)
(Arms broken, legs sundered.@My skull caves inwards.)
(Body crushed, ribs stab into my organs.@My heart stops...)
